title: client unresponsive randomly.
body: i was just in champion select for rank; im in my promos n my client just crash losing my promos.pls do something about this.apparently they know tat i dodge but doesnt know tat the client became unresponsive.this happens alot, sometimes i dont see icons in champion select.i know my brothers has have just issues 2.pls do somethings!!!

replies.body:
It sounds like your computer was experiencing a poor connection to the League servers. Working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should resolve this, as these issues are often affected by network configurations that conflict with League.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
